definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: There is nothing illegal about our decision to implement a nonsmoking hiring policy, ’’ said Stephen F.
sentences.chinese: 我们做出拒收吸烟者的决定并不违法。

sentences.english: Why is your child being declined to a gifted program because he lacks self confidence?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你的孩子被天才班拒收，就因为他缺乏自信？

sentences.english: Store Keeper has right to reject products which are not accord with Purchase Order.
sentences.chinese: 对于不符合采购申请表的采购，库管有权拒收。

sentences.english: holds back out-of-order messages until missing messages arrive
sentences.chinese: 在丢失的消息到达前，拒收顺序错乱的消息。

sentences.english: Non-compliant product in production or unshipped will be rejected.
sentences.chinese: 生产中的和尚未出货的违规产品将被拒收。

sentences.english: People just refuse to accept money. Suddenly, there is no medium of exchange.
sentences.chinese: 人们拒收货币，突然，没有了交换媒介，市场崩溃。

sentences.english: To our astonishment we learn from your telegram, that you refused to accept the goods .
sentences.chinese: 从您来电中我们惊悉你们拒收这批货物。

sentences.english: Those that do not comply with such specifications should be rejected to prevent their use in operations for which they are unsuitable.
sentences.chinese: 不合格者要拒收，不得用于不适合于其的操作中。

sentences.english: It also costs time invisibly that we reject the goods which are not satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 虽然货物不满意可以拒收，但无形之中也耽误了时间。

sentences.english: If you do not wish to receive any promotional emails from FlexWorkflow, please complete the unsubscription form .
sentences.chinese: 若不欲再接收本公司电邮，请填写拒收表格。

sentences.english: Suddenly, there is no medium of exchange. The markets collapse.
sentences.chinese: 人们拒收货币，突然，没有了交换媒介，市场崩溃。

sentences.english: Coating work may be rejected if the procedure used in applying the liquid-epoxy coating material does not comply with this standard.
sentences.chinese: 业主也有权拒收不符合标准生产的涂塑产品。

definition: to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to receive sth on another's behalf
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to refuse to accept a payment/to refuse to pay/to stop (a check or payment)
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
